name: Mimir's Recruit
description:
A simple human looking for guidance decides to seek out the gods' advisor, Mimir. However, getting help from the wisest of gods is not as easy as it sounds.

Challenged in a logical game, win all the challenges posed by the deity and prove yourself worthy of drinking from the Mímisbrunnr well

Find the correct sequence of runes by deducting the correct position from each rune by knowing just how many are in the correct position. You won't have any help beyond that. For each challenge won, a more challenging one will be proposed

Complete all challenges and prove your worth

Resources
  • 40 logical levels, based on feedback
  • Atmosphere in Norse Mythology
  • Steam achievements
  • Ultrawide resolution support
